Package common

Class ShoppingCart

java.lang.Object
common.ShoppingCart
public class ShoppingCart extends Object
Represents a shopping cart that holds products and their quantities.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ShoppingCart()
    Constructs an empty ShoppingCart.
    ShoppingCart(List<Product> products, List<Integer> counts)
    Constructs a ShoppingCart with given lists of products and their quantities.
    ShoppingCart(Map<Product,Integer> items)
    Constructs a ShoppingCart with initial items and their quantities.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart()
      Constructs an empty ShoppingCart.

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart(Map<Product,Integer> items)
      Constructs a ShoppingCart with initial items and their quantities.
      Parameters:
      items - A map containing products as keys and their quantities as values.

    • ShoppingCart

      public ShoppingCart(List<Product> products, List<Integer> counts)
      Constructs a ShoppingCart with given lists of products and their quantities.
      Parameters:
      products - The list of products.
      counts - The list of corresponding quantities.

  • Method Details

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Product product)
      Checks if the ShoppingCart contains a particular product.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to check for existence.
      Returns:
      True if the product exists in the cart, otherwise false.

    • incrementProduct

      public void incrementProduct(Product product)
      Increments the quantity of a product in the ShoppingCart. If the product is not present, it adds it to the cart.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to increment in the cart.

    • decrementProduct

      public void decrementProduct(Product product)
      Decrements the quantity of a product in the ShoppingCart. If the quantity becomes zero, it removes the product from the cart.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to decrement in the cart.

    • getProduct

      public Product getProduct(int index)
      Retrieves the product at a specified index in the ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the product to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The product at the specified index.

    • getProducts

      public List<Product> getProducts()
      Retrieves the list of products in the ShoppingCart.
      Returns:
      The list of products in the ShoppingCart.

    • getCount

      public Integer getCount(int index)
      Retrieves the quantity of a product at a specified index in the ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the product to retrieve the quantity for.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the product at the specified index.

    • getCount

      public Integer getCount(Product product)
      Retrieves the quantity of a specified product in the ShoppingCart.
      Parameters:
      product - The product to retrieve the quantity for.
      Returns:
      The quantity of the specified product in the ShoppingCart.

    • getCartTotal

      public double getCartTotal()
      Calculates the total price of all products in the ShoppingCart.
      Returns:
      The total price of all products in the ShoppingCart.

    • addCartUpdatedListener

      public void addCartUpdatedListener(ActionListener listener)
      Adds a listener for cart updated events.
      Parameters:
      listener - The ActionListener to be added as a listener.

    • removeCartUpdatedListener

      public void removeCartUpdatedListener(ActionListener listener)
      Removes a listener for cart updated events.
      Parameters:
      listener - The ActionListener to be removed as a listener.

    • removeAllProducts

      public void removeAllProducts()
      Removes all products from the ShoppingCart.
